p: The EO of H. officinalis subsp. aristatus aboveground biomass was sequentially collected in seven distinct fractions ( Table 1). The control treatment (nonstop 90 min distillation) resulted in 1.12% EO in fresh aboveground biomass. Most of the EO (39% of the total oil yield) was extracted at the beginning of the hydrodistillation (0â€“5 min) ( Table 1).
